data.name: AlreadyCarryingIt
data.value: You are already carrying it.

data.name: ArentCarryingIt
data.value: You aren't carrying it.

data.name: BarredBySerpent
data.value: A huge green fierce serpent bars the way!

data.name: BirdAlive
data.value: The bird statue comes to life and attacks the serpent and in an astounding flurry, drives the serpent away. The bird turns back into a statue.

data.name: BottleAlreadyFull
data.value: Your bottle is already full.

data.name: BrassLantern
data.value: Brass Lantern

data.name: BridgeAppears
data.value: A stone bridge now spans the bottomless pit.

data.name: BridgeRetracted
data.value: The stone bridge has retracted!

data.name: BrokenNeck
data.value: You are at the bottom of the pit with a broken neck.

data.name: CantCarryAnymore
data.value: You can't carry anything more. You'll have to drop something first.

data.name: CantCrossPit
data.value: There is no way across the bottomless pit.

data.name: CantFitThroughTwoInchSlit
data.value: You don't fit through the two-inch slit!

data.name: ClimbedPlant
data.value: You've climbed up the plant and out of the pit.

data.name: ClimbPlant
data.value: You clamber up the plant and scurry through the hole at the top.

data.name: CrackTooSmall
data.value: The crack is far too small for you to follow.

data.name: CrawledAround
data.value: You have crawled around in some little holes and found your way blocked by a fallen slab. You are now back in the main passage.

data.name: CrawledAroundBackToMainPassage
data.value: You have crawled around in some little holes and wound up back in the main passage.

data.name: CrawlToPassage
data.value: You have crawled through a very low wide passage parallel to and north of the hall of gods.

data.name: CrossDontJump
data.value: I respectfully suggest you go across the bridge instead of jumping.

data.name: DeadEnd
data.value: Dead end.

data.name: Desert
data.value: You are in the desert.

data.name: DidntMakeIt
data.value: You didn't make it.

data.name: DiscardedStatueBox
data.value: There is a small statue box discarded nearby.

data.name: DomeUnclimbable
data.value: The dome is unclimbable.

data.name: DontBeRidiculous
data.value: Don't be ridiculous!

data.name: DontKnowThatWord
data.value: I don't know that word.

data.name: DontKnowWhatYouMean
data.value: I don't know what you mean.

data.name: DontUnderstand
data.value: I don't understand.

data.name: DropSomething
data.value: Something you're carrying won't fit through the tunnel with you. You'd best take inventory and drop something.

data.name: FellIntoPit
data.value: You fell into a pit and broke every bone in your body.

data.name: FreshBatteries
data.value: There are now some fresh batteries here.

data.name: GiganticBeanStalk
data.value: There is a gigantic beam stalk stretching all the way up to the hole.

data.name: GottenKilled
data.value: Oh dear, you seem to have gotten yourself killed. I might be able to help you out, but I've never really done this before.

data.name: ISeeNo
data.value: I see no {0} here.

data.name: ItsPitchDark
data.value: It is now pitch dark. If you proceed, you will likely fall into a pit.

data.name: LampShining
data.value: There is a lamp shining nearby.

data.name: Maze
data.value: You are in a maze of twisty passages, all alike.

data.name: MummyStealsTreasures
data.value: Suddenly, a mummy creeps up behind you!! "I'm the keeper of the tomb", he wails, "I take these treasures and put them in the chest deep in the maze!" He grabs your treasure and vanishes into the gloom.

data.name: NoLongerRememberHowYouGotHere
data.value: Sorry, but I no longer seem to remember how it was you got here.

data.name: NotCarryingAnything
data.value: You're not carrying anything.

data.name: NothingToClimb
data.value: There is nothing here to climb. Use up or out to leave the pit.

data.name: Ok
data.value: Ok

data.name: OverwateredPlant
data.value: You've over-watered the plant! It's shrivelling up!

data.name: PlantBellowing
data.value: There is a twelve foot bean stalk stretching up out of the pit, bellowing "Water... Water..."

data.name: PlantGrows
data.value: The plant grows explosively, almost filling the bottom of the pit.

data.name: PlantMurmuring
data.value: There is a tiny plant in the pit, murmuring "Water, Water, ..."

data.name: PlantSpurts
data.value: The plant spurts into furious growth for a few seconds.

data.name: Room1
data.value: You are standing before the entrance of a pyramid. Around you is a desert.

data.name: Room10
data.value: You are in an awkward sloping east/west corridor.

data.name: Room11
data.value: You are in a splendid chamber thirty feet high. The walls are frozen rivers of orange stone. An awkward corridor and a good passage exit from the east and west sides of the chamber.

data.name: Room12
data.value: At your feet is a small pit breathing traces of white mist. An east passage ends here except for a small crack leading on. Rough stone steps lead down the pit.

data.name: Room13
data.value: You are at one end of a vast hall stretching forward out of sight to the west. There are openings to either side. Nearby, a wide stone staircase leads downward. The hall is very musty and a cold wind blows up the staircase. There is a passage at the top of a dome behind you. Rought stone steps lead up the dome.

data.name: Room14
data.value: This is a low room with a hieroglyph on the wall. It translates "You won't get it up the steps".

data.name: Room15
data.value: You are on the east bank of a bottomless pit stretching across the hall. The mist is quite thick here, and the pit is too wide to jump.

data.name: Room16
data.value: You are in the pharaoh's chamber, with passages off in all directions.

data.name: Room17
data.value: You are in the south side chamber.

data.name: Room18
data.value: You are on the west side of the bottomless pit in the hall of gods.

data.name: Room19
data.value: You are at the west end of the hall of gods. A low wide pass continues west and another goes north. To the south is a little passage six feet off the floor.

data.name: Room2
data.value: You are in the entrance to the pyramid. A hole in the floor leads to a passage beneath the surface.

data.name: Room20
data.value: You are at east end of a very long hall apparently without side chambers. To the east a low wide crawl slants up. To the north a round two foot hole slants down.

data.name: Room21
data.value: You are at the west end of a very long featureless hall. The hall joins up with a narrow north/south passage.

data.name: Room22
data.value: You are at a crossover of a high N/S passage and a low E/W one.

data.name: Room24
data.value: You are in the west throne chamber. A passage continues west and up from here.

data.name: Room25
data.value: You are in a low N/S passage at a hole in the floor. The hole goes down to an E/W passage.

data.name: Room26
data.value: You are in a large room, with a passage to the south, and a wall of broken rock to the east. There is a panel on the north wall.

data.name: Room27
data.value: You are in the chamber of Anubis.

data.name: Room52
data.value: You are on the brink of a large pit. You could climb down, but you would not be able to climb back up. The maze continues on this level.

data.name: Room54
data.value: You are in a dirty broken passage. To the east is a crawl. To the west is a large passage. Above you is a hole to another passage.

data.name: Room55
data.value: You are on the brink of a small clean climbable pit. A crawl leads west.

data.name: Room56
data.value: You are in the bottom of a small pit with a little stream, which enters and exits through tiny slits.

data.name: Room57
data.value: You are in the room of Bes, whose picture is on the wall. There is a big hole in the floor. There is a passage leading east.

data.name: Room58
data.value: You are at a complex junction. A low hands and knees passage from the north joins a higher crawl from the east to make a walking passage going west. There is also a large room above. The air is damp here.

data.name: Room59
data.value: You are in the underworld anteroom of Seker. Passages go east, west, and up. Human bones are strewn about on the floor. Hieroglyphics on the wall roughly translate to "Those who proceed east may never return.".

data.name: Room60
data.value: You are at the land of dead. Passages lead off in >all< directions.

data.name: Room61
data.value: You're in a large room with ancient drawings on all walls. The pictures depict Atum, a pharaoh wearing the double crown. A shallow passage proceeds downward, and a somewhat steeper one leads up. A low hands and knees passage enters from the south.

data.name: Room62
data.value: You are in a chamber whose wall contains a picture of a man wearing the lunar disk on his head. He is the god Khons, the moon god.

data.name: Room63
data.value: You are in a long sloping corridor with ragged walls.

data.name: Room64
data.value: You are in a cul-de-sac about eight feet across.

data.name: Room65
data.value: You are in the chamber of Horus, a long east/west passage with holes everywhere. To explore at random, select north, south, up, or down.

data.name: Room66
data.value: You are in a large low circular chamber whose floor is an immense slab fallen from the ceiling. East and west there once where large passages, but they are now filled with sand. Low small passages go north and south.

data.name: Room68
data.value: You are in the chamber of Nekhebet, a woman with the head of a vulture, wearing the crown of Egypt. A passage exits to the south.

data.name: Room7
data.value: You are in a small chamber beneath a hole from the surface. A low crawl leads inward to the west. Hieroglyphics on the wall translate, "Curse all who enter this sacred crypt."

data.name: Room70
data.value: The passage here is blocked by a fallen block.

data.name: Room71
data.value: You are in the chamber of Osiris. The ceiling is too high up for your lamp to show it. Passages lead east, north, and south.

data.name: Room72
data.value: You are in the priest's bedroom. The walls are covered with curtains, the floor with a thick pile carpet. Moss covers the ceiling.

data.name: Room73
data.value: This is the chamber of the high priest. Ancient drawings cover the walls. An extremely tight tunnel leads west. It looks like a tight squeeze. Another passage leads SE.

data.name: Room76
data.value: You are in the high priest's treasure room lit by an eerie green light. A narrow tunnel exits to the east.

data.name: Room77
data.value: You are in a long, narrow corridor stretching out of sight to the west. At the eastern end is a hole through which you can see a profusion of leaves.

data.name: Room78
data.value: You are at the east end of the twopit room. The floor here is littered with thin rock slabs, which make it easy to descend the pits. There is a path here bypassing the pits to connect passages east and west. There are holes all over, but the only big one is on the wall directly over the west pit where you can't get to it.

data.name: Room79
data.value: You are at the bottom of the eastern pit in the twopit room.

data.name: Room8
data.value: You are crawling over pebbles in a low passage. There is a dim light at the east end of the passage.

data.name: Room80
data.value: You are at the west end of the twopit room. There is a large hole in the wall above the pit at this end of the room.

data.name: Room81
data.value: You are at the bottom of the west pit in the twopit room. There is a large hole in the wall about twenty five feet above you.

data.name: Room9
data.value: You are in a room filled with broken shards of ancient egyptian crafts. An awkward corridor leads upward and west.

data.name: SarcophagusDoesntFit
data.value: You can't fit this big sarcophagus through that little passage!

data.name: SerpentBlocks
data.value: You can't get by the serpent.

data.name: ShinyBrassLamp
data.value: There is a shiny brass lamp nearby.

data.name: StatueBox
data.value: Statue box

data.name: TryToReincarnate
data.value: Do you want me to try to reincarnate you?

data.name: VendingMachine
data.value: There is a massive vending machine here. The instructions on it read- "Drop coins here to receive fresh batteries".

data.name: VerbWhat
data.value: {0} what?

data.name: What
data.value: What?

data.name: WhatDoYouWantToDoWith
data.value: What do you want me to do with the {0} ?

data.name: YouHaveScored
data.value: You have scored {0: 0000;-0000} out of a possible 0220, using {1:0000} turns.

data.name: AttackingSerpentFails
data.value: Attacking the serpent both doesn't work and is very dangerous.

data.name: Batteries
data.value: Batteries

data.name: BatteriesFreshLongDesc
data.value: There are fresh batteries here.

data.name: BatteriesWornLongDesc
data.value: Some worn-out batteries have been discarded nearby.

data.name: BeyondYourPower
data.value: It is beyond your power to do that.

data.name: BirdNotHungry
data.value: It's not hungry. Besides, you have no bird seed.

data.name: BirdStatueDead
data.value: The bird statue is now dead. Its body disappears.

data.name: Bottle
data.value: Small bottle

data.name: BottleLongDesc
data.value: There is a bottle here.

data.name: CantBeSerious
data.value: You can't be serious!

data.name: CantCarryStatue
data.value: You can lift the statue, but you cannot carry it.

data.name: CantFillThat
data.value: You can't fill that.

data.name: CantPourThat
data.value: You can't pour that.

data.name: Chest
data.value: Treasure chest

data.name: ChestLongDesc
data.value: The pharaoh's treasure chest is here!

data.name: Coins
data.value: Rare coins

data.name: CoinsLongDesc
data.value: There are many coins here!

data.name: Delicious
data.value: Thank you, it was delicious!

data.name: Diamonds
data.value: Several diamonds

data.name: DiamondsLongDesc
data.value: There are diamonds here!

data.name: DontKnowHow
data.value: I don't know how.

data.name: DontKnowHowToApplyWord
data.value: I don't know how to apply that word here.

data.name: DontKnowHowToLockUnlock
data.value: I don't know how to lock or unlock such a thing.

data.name: DrinkFromStream
data.value: You have taken a drink from the stream. The water tastes strongly of minerals, but is not unpleasant. It is extremely cold.

data.name: Emerald
data.value: Egg-sized emerald

data.name: EmeraldLongDesc
data.value: There is an emerald here the size of a plover's egg!

data.name: EmptyBottle
data.value: The bottle is now empty.

data.name: EmptyBottleWetGround
data.value: Your bottle is empty and the ground is wet.

data.name: EmptySarcophagus
data.value: The sarcophagus creaks open, revealing nothing inside. It promptly snaps shut again.

data.name: FloorLitteredWithShards
data.value: The floor is littered with worthless shards of pottery.

data.name: Food
data.value: Tasty food

data.name: FoodLongDesc
data.value: There is food here.

data.name: GlisteningPearl
data.value: Glistening pearl

data.name: GlisteningPearlLongDesc
data.value: Off to one side lies a glistening pearl!

data.name: Gold
data.value: Large gold nugget

data.name: GoldLongDesc
data.value: There is a large sparkling nugget of gold here!

data.name: ImGame
data.value: I'm game. Would you care to explain how?

data.name: Jewelry
data.value: Precious jewelry

data.name: JewelryLongDesc
data.value: There is precious jewelry here!

data.name: Key
data.value: Jeweled key

data.name: KeyLongDesc
data.value: There is a jewel-encrusted key here!

data.name: LampGettingDim
data.value: Your lamp is getting dim. You'd best start wrapping this up, unless you can find some fresh batteries. I seem to recall there is a vending machine in the maze. Bring some coins with you.

data.name: LampGettingDimChangingBatteries
data.value: Your lamp is getting dim. I'm taking the liberty of replacing the batteries.

data.name: LampIsNowOff
data.value: Your lamp is now off.

data.name: LampIsNowOn
data.value: Your lamp is now on.

data.name: LampOutOfPower
data.value: Your lamp has run out of power.

data.name: LostAppetite
data.value: I think I just lost my appetite.

data.name: Magazine
data.value: "Egyptian weekly"

data.name: MagazineLongDesc
data.value: There are a few recent issues of "Egyptian weekly" magazine here.

data.name: Nest
data.value: Golden eggs

data.name: NestLongDesc
data.value: There is a large nest here, full of golden eggs!

data.name: NoSourceOfLight
data.value: You have no source of light.

data.name: NothingHappens
data.value: Nothing happens.

data.name: NothingToFillBottleWith
data.value: There is nothing here with which to fill the bottle.

data.name: NotStrongEnoughToOpenSarcophagus
data.value: You don't have anything strong enough to open the sarcophagus.

data.name: NoWayToGoThatDirection
data.value: There is no way for you to go that direction.

data.name: PearlFallsOut
data.value: A glistening pearl falls out of the sarcophagus and rolls away. The sarcophagus snaps shut again.

data.name: Peculiar
data.value: Peculiar. Nothing unexpected happens.

data.name: Pillow
data.value: Velvet pillow

data.name: PlantCantBePulledFree
data.value: The plant has exceptionally deep roots and cannot be pulled free.

data.name: PutSarcophagusDown
data.value: I'd advise you to put down the sarcophagus before opening it!!

data.name: RubbingNothingHappens
data.value: Rubbing the electric lamp is not particularly rewarding. Anyway, nothing exciting happens.

data.name: Sarcophagus
data.value: Sarcophagus >groan<

data.name: SarcophagusLongDesc
data.value: There is a sarcophagus here with it's cover tightly closed.

data.name: Scepter
data.value: Scepter

data.name: SerpentEatenBird
data.value: The serpent has now devoured your bird statue.

data.name: SerpentHasNothingToEat
data.value: There is nothing here it wants to eat - except perhaps you.

data.name: Silver
data.value: Silver bars

data.name: SilverLongDesc
data.value: There are bars of silver here!

data.name: SmallVelvetPillow
data.value: A small velvet pillow lies on the floor.

data.name: StatueComesToLife
data.value: As you approach the statue, it comes to life and flies across the chamber where it lands and returns to stone.

data.name: StatueInBox
data.value: Bird statue in box.

data.name: StatueOfBirdGod
data.value: A statue of the bird god is sitting here.

data.name: StoneVeryStrong
data.value: The stone is very strong and is impervious to attack.

data.name: ThreeFootScepter
data.value: A three foot scepter with an ankh on an end lies nearby.

data.name: UnsureHowYouAreFacing
data.value: I am unsure how you are facing. Use compass points.

data.name: UseCompassPoints
data.value: I don't know in from out here. Use compass points.

data.name: Vase
data.value: Vase

data.name: VaseDropsWithCrash
data.value: The vase drops with a delicate crash.

data.name: VaseHurledToGround
data.value: You have taken the vase and hurled it delicately to the ground.

data.name: VasePillowLongDesc
data.value: The vase is now resting, delicately, on a velvet pillow.

data.name: VaseRestingOnPillow
data.value: The vase is now resting, delicately, on a velvet pillow.

data.name: VaseSoloLongDesc
data.value: There is a delicate, precious, vase here!

data.name: Water
data.value: Water in the bottle

data.name: WaterLongDesc
data.value: There is water in the bottle.

data.name: Welcome
data.value: Welcome to pyramid!!

data.name: BirdBoxed
data.value: Bird statue in box

data.name: BirdBoxedLongDesc
data.value: There is a bird statue in the box.

data.name: Help
data.value: I'm as confused as you are!

data.name: YouAreHolding
data.value: You are currently holding the following:
